ModMetaData.name: [PL] Hospitality Pay-to-Access Doors
ModMetaData.author: ProgrammerLily
ModMetaData.description:
Adds a pay-to-access system to doors, perfect for monetizing guest access to valuable rooms like spas, arcades, or luxury bedrooms.
Features: • Configure any door as a "Pay-to-Access Door" • Set entry cost (default: 5 silver) • Choose payment mode: "Pay Once" vs "Pay Every Time" • Exemption settings for colonists, allies, and prisoners • Visual payment feedback • Multi-door selection and configuration • Integration with Hospitality mod for guest management
Perfect for creating premium areas that guests must pay to enter!
